author: Emma
content:
I almost forgot to say, what a marvelous idea to link your pictures with a song. Another thing you can surprise me with. And that for almost every day. ðŸ™‚
How do you manage that. The Google thing, I suppose. Or are you a music freak too and all this stuff is 'actual knowledge'? (I don't remember the right words for this, will you forgive me? ðŸ™‚)
